description:
Shimosaka Sagen and a force of 300 Iga ninjas await Kanetsugu at the cemetery of Mount Koya. Though Kanetsugu and party seem to be doomed, his secret scheme proves efficacious. Sagen decides to reject his affiliation with Tokugawa, and determines to fight Kanetsugu one on one. KanetsuguÕs actions are strange; he takes an iron fan in hand, and begins to dance. The battle for the Jizo Bodhisattva, which contains critical secrets of Uesugi, comes to its righteous conclusion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kataredomo Tsukinu wa Otoko no Monogatari
Les aventures d’un guerrier ne finissent jamais...
The Endless Story Told of Men
語れども尽きぬは漢の物語
